item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2022-03-11_1636_0800_FBI_XiJinping_fr_and_LiKeqiang_org.pdf

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 China Standard Time. It was sent to Mr. Rogalski and Mr. Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

From: Vincent B. Le Corre

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org

item.title: McPrisoners of Conscience – Full Article (1997) Used in ECtHR Case 50552/22 (V.L.C. v France)
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original article: guttenplan-1997-mcprisoners-of-conscience.pdf ⚠️ Legal note: This article is reproduced here solely for non-commercial, educational, and evidentiary use under fair dealing (UK) / fair use (US/ECHR). It forms part of evidence submitted in Case 50522/22 before the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR). The applicant (Vincent Le Corre) and/or his family-in-law could potentially face the death penalty in China, a matter of urgent and irreversible consequence. The full background and threat assessment are publicly documented in this open letter to British MP Yuan YANG:
